DPRK FM Meets Chinese Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs 
   Pyongyang, December 18 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, met and conversed with Wu Dawei, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of China who is chairman of the six-party talks, and his party on Tuesday when the latter paid a courtesy call on him.

Canciller coreano se reune con el vicecanciller chino
   Pyongyang, 18 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El canciller coreano Pak Ui Chun departio el dia 18 con el viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores de China, Wu Dawi, presidente de las conversaciones a 6 bandas, quien le hizo una visita de cortesia, y su comitiva.
